name: Steven2PM's Maze 2
description:
Welcome To The Chapter 2! I Will Tell New Stuffs!

1. Different Map/Bigger Map

2. Decorations

3. Some Posters Of My Youtube Thumbnails

4. Moving Characters

5. Minigames

6. Secret Ending More Glitched

Story: Steven Made Another Maze More Bigger Than His 1st Maze! So John Decide To Go! He Need To Steal 7 Blue Books For His Other Freinds! But Be Sneaky Cuz Steven Does'nt Like People Stealing His Own Bluebooks!
